dict.string: We need background location access to track your time spent away from home.
We need background location access to track your time spent away from home.
We need location access while using the app to track your activity range.
This app uses motion data to adjust location update frequency based on your activity.
analyze your health data and provide insights"].
Your app needs to update health data to [具体用途，如 "record your activity and monitor your fitness goals"].
